SharedStructs.GaiaXDID","name":"","type":"tuple"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"did","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"systemId","type":"string"}],"name":"getIntegrationStatus","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"status","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"getRoleAdmin","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"grantRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"hasRole","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"did","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"systemId","type":"string"}],"name":"integrateWithLegacySystem","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"success","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"isDIDRegistered","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"uri","type":"string"}],"name":"isVerified","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"string","name":"action","type":"string"}],"name":"logDIDAction","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"did","type":"string"}],"name":"pingAPI","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"success","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"string","name":"uri","type":"string"},{"internalType":"address","name":"publicKey","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"trustLevel","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"string[]","name":"serviceEndpoints","type":"string[]"},{"internalType":"string[]","name":"roles","type":"string[]"}],"name":"registerDID","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"callerConfirmation","type":"address"}],"name":"renounceRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"revokeDID","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"revokeRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"tokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"setBatteryPassport","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"string","name":"context","type":"string"}],"name":"storeDIDMetadata","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"string","name":"requiredRole","type":"string"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"requiredTrustLevel","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"address","name":"signer","type":"address"}],"name":"validateDIDRole","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"didHash","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"status","type":"bool"}],"name":"verifyGaiaXDID","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Provides functionality to register, verify, revoke, and validate DIDs. Integrates with SharedStructs for structured data. Features: - Register DIDs with associated metadata such as URI, public key, roles, and trust levels. - Verify or revoke DIDs based on their hash. - Validate if a DID meets role and trust level requirements. - Emit events for key actions like registration, verification, revocation, and logged actions. Roles: - `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE`: Has full permissions and can assign other roles. - `GOVERNMENT_ROLE`: Can register, verify, revoke DIDs, and perform privileged actions. Usage: - Deploy the contract; the deployer is assigned both `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` and `GOVERNMENT_ROLE`. - Use `registerDID` to create a new DID entry. - Use `verifyGaiaXDID` to mark a DID as verified. - Use `validateDIDRole` to check if a DID satisfies a role and trust level requirement. - Use `revokeDID` to revoke the verification status of a DID. - Emit events to track actions taken on DIDs for transparency and logging. Events: - `DIDRegistered`: Emitted when a new DID is registered. - `DIDVerified`: Emitted when a DID is verified or unverified. - `DIDActionLogged`: Emitted when an action is logged for a DID. Limitations: - Relies on `SharedStructs` for structured DID data storage and retrieval. - Only accounts with appropriate roles can perform specific actions.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}]},"events":{"DIDActionLogged(bytes32,string,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when an action is logged for a DID.","params":{"action":"The action performed.","didHash":"The hash of the DID.","timestamp":"The timestamp of the action."}},"DIDRegistered(bytes32,string,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a new DID is registered.","params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID.","role":"The primary role of the DID owner.","timestamp":"The timestamp of registration."}},"DIDVerified(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a DID is verified or unverified.","params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID.","timestamp":"The timestamp of the verification update."}},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addRoleToDID(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Only the DID owner or an account with `GOVERNMENT_ROLE` can call this      function. This prevents unauthorized role escalation.","params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to update.","role":"The new role to add."}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor to assign DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE and GOVERNMENT_ROLE to the deployer."},"exportDID(string)":{"params":{"did":"The Decentralized Identifier (DID) to export."},"returns":{"exportedData":"A string representing the exported data of the DID."}},"getDID(bytes32)":{"params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to retrieve."},"returns":{"_0":"SharedStructs.GaiaXDID struct containing DID details."}},"getIntegrationStatus(string,string)":{"params":{"did":"The Decentralized Identifier (DID) to query.","systemId":"The identifier of the legacy system."},"returns":{"status":"A boolean indicating the integration status."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"integrateWithLegacySystem(string,string)":{"params":{"did":"The Decentralized Identifier (DID) to integrate.","systemId":"The identifier of the legacy system."},"returns":{"success":"A boolean indicating if the integration was successful."}},"isDIDRegistered(bytes32)":{"params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool indicating whether the DID is registered."}},"isVerified(string)":{"params":{"uri":"The URI of the DID to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool indicating whether the DID is verified."}},"logDIDAction(bytes32,string)":{"params":{"action":"The action performed.","didHash":"The hash of the DID."}},"pingAPI(string)":{"params":{"did":"The Decentralized Identifier (DID) to test."},"returns":{"success":"A boolean indicating if the API interaction was successful."}},"registerDID(bytes32,string,address,uint8,string[],string[])":{"details":"Only accounts with GOVERNMENT_ROLE can register a DID.","params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to register.","publicKey":"The public key associated with the DID.","roles":"The roles associated with the DID.","serviceEndpoints":"The service endpoints for the DID.","trustLevel":"The trust level of the DID (1 to 5).","uri":"The URI of the DID."}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeDID(bytes32)":{"details":"Only accounts with GOVERNMENT_ROLE can revoke a DID.","params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to revoke."}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"storeDIDMetadata(bytes32,string)":{"params":{"context":"A string providing context for the metadata (e.g., \"Battery Passport Creation\").","didHash":"The hash of the DID."},"returns":{"_0":"success True if the metadata was stored successfully."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"validateDIDRole(bytes32,string,uint8,address)":{"params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to validate.","requiredRole":"The required role for validation.","requiredTrustLevel":"The minimum trust level required.","signer":"The address of the signer to validate against the DID's public key."},"returns":{"_0":"bool indicating whether the validation passed."}},"verifyGaiaXDID(bytes32,bool)":{"details":"Only accounts with GOVERNMENT_ROLE can perform this action.","params":{"didHash":"The hash of the DID to verify.","status":"The verification status (true for verified, false for unverified)."}}},"title":"DIDManager","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addRoleToDID(bytes32,string)":{"notice":"Adds a new role to an existing DID."},"exportDID(string)":{"notice":"Exports the data associated with a DID."},"getDID(bytes32)":{"notice":"Retrieves details of a registered legacy system."},"isDIDRegistered(bytes32)":{"notice":"Checks if a DID is registered."},"isVerified(string)":{"notice":"Checks if a DID is verified."},"logDIDAction(bytes32,string)":{"notice":"Logs an external action for a DID."},"pingAPI(string)":{"notice":"Simulates an API interaction for a given DID."},"registerDID(bytes32,string,address,uint8,string[],string[])":{"notice":"Registers a new DID."},"revokeDID(bytes32)":{"notice":"Revokes a registered DID."},"storeDIDMetadata(bytes32,string)":{"notice":"Stores or updates metadata for a DID."},"validateDIDRole(bytes32,string,uint8,address)":{"notice":"Validates a DID's role and trust level."},"verifyGaiaXDID(bytes32,bool)":{"notice":"Verifies or un-verifies a DID."}},"notice":"This contract manages Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs), their roles, trust levels, and verification 353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"src/interfaces/IDIDManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xddda95a5a25714db925e858caca6501133d188630d355b3e7dd7f3c969a5de5f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fa13f6a4e21f0ef45cbcdc6d1058ae5a09b81364fbae521adb37db4f8e802d7f","dweb:/ipfs/QmYF1LgoF6uwNHXcyQrq8WEYRCtPtcrrGTRXYDRiBaJ9Ys"]},"src/libraries/SharedStructs.sol":{"keccak256":"0x15f7a25d927200b51ea16e844c812dbd57933b4e6dfbb46182877926f2ecdc88","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7873b9442ef34543dbf26e8e676c19fcf91e2b34ba27c6e38cf9241b102e731","dweb:/ipfs/QmXazwuzdVgLPBzrm71atzucCzwebzHAriXEWPT76n68yL"]},"src/managers/DIDManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbef4a8fd3cee35f6f4cec207b6fd4e6d11ab32501e8a9e66b78792bc31d374e1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://90f5b1d0ea0e1a9dd1ea2c67774b64de9ba1b493c7962475a2cb1f020d9a379d","dweb:/ipfs/QmPy8acKKMVvXjUa9Jq8B5aHHrDkVqLPZdchSxciKWVSp5"]}},"version":1}

addRoleToDID(bytes32,string).details: Only the DID owner or an account with `GOVERNMENT_ROLE` can call this      function. This prevents unauthorized role escalation.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to update.

constructor.details: Constructor to assign DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE and GOVERNMENT_ROLE to the deployer.

returns.exportedData: A string representing the exported data of the DID.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to retrieve.

params.systemId: The identifier of the legacy system.

returns.status: A boolean indicating the integration status.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.systemId: The identifier of the legacy system.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the integration was successful.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to check.

returns._0: bool indicating whether the DID is registered.

params.uri: The URI of the DID to check.

returns._0: bool indicating whether the DID is verified.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the API interaction was successful.

registerDID(bytes32,string,address,uint8.details: Only accounts with GOVERNMENT_ROLE can register a DID.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to register.
params.publicKey: The public key associated with the DID.
params.roles: The roles associated with the DID.
params.serviceEndpoints: The service endpoints for the DID.
params.trustLevel: The trust level of the DID (1 to 5).

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeDID(bytes32).details: Only accounts with GOVERNMENT_ROLE can revoke a DID.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to revoke.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.context: A string providing context for the metadata (e.g., "Battery Passport Creation").

returns._0: success True if the metadata was stored successfully.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to validate.
params.signer: The address of the signer to validate against the DID's public key.

returns._0: bool indicating whether the validation passed.

verifyGaiaXDID(bytes32,bool).details: Only accounts with GOVERNMENT_ROLE can perform this action.

params.didHash: The hash of the DID to verify.
params.status: The verification status (true for verified, false for unverified).

addRoleToDID(bytes32,string).notice: Adds a new role to an existing DID.

exportDID(string).notice: Exports the data associated with a DID.

getDID(bytes32).notice: Retrieves details of a registered DID.

getIntegrationStatus(string,string).notice: Retrieves the integration status of a DID with a legacy system.

integrateWithLegacySystem(string,string).notice: Integrates a DID with a legacy system.

isDIDRegistered(bytes32).notice: Checks if a DID is registered.

isVerified(string).notice: Checks if a DID is verified.

logDIDAction(bytes32,string).notice: Logs an external action for a DID.

pingAPI(string).notice: Simulates an API interaction for a given DID.

storeDIDMetadata(bytes32,string).notice: Stores or updates metadata for a DID.

validateDIDRole(bytes32,string,uint8,add.notice: Validates a DID's role and trust level.
